creator: Quick Art Lab
descriptionHtml:
Motion Photo Editor

Now make fabulous Motion in Photos, Motion Photo Editor - Photo Animator & Video Maker is a unique application to create animated photo with latest motion effects. Bring your Photos to app and make awesome motion picture-free images with simple tools. This 3D Photo Motion Maker : Moving Picture, Photo Motion app allows you to apply motion animation effect on a specific object, just select the area and provide direction for photo motion moving pictures.

Using this Moving Photo Effect : Live Photo Animator Motion app you can create background motion picture, live photo to video and animated pictures. You can change easily your pictures to alight motion, live photo, and moving image also running photos, motion art, and moving background pictures. Just Download this Photo Motion Effect : 3D Moving Picture app which gives you all the functionalities of moving images and show your loop photos with your friends now.

Make fabulous live photos, live wallpapers & gifs with animation effects using Movepic 3d photo editor & video motion editor with music. Add amazing animation effects, including 180+ dynamic sky replacement, 200+ live 3d stickers, as well as 150+ popular 3d filter and overlays. Particle dispersion, glitch arts and more!

Make these moving backgrounds photos and live wallpapers to apply your mobile home screen. The various animated effects and delightful filters, it's the foremost creative way to share your live photo and motion pictures on social media. Add an incredible cinema graphs effect to your live photo, just select any area within the photo and add motion art effect to your image. Add the real camera moving effects to your photos. Make graphic images that stand out of the crowd with this powerful application.

Add enjoyable Overlays to bring mood and emotion to your still photos. Get motion Photo Editor effects to make your stories come alive and alight motion with unique overlays. Use motion pictures and share your creative live photo visual stories on social media. Make these moving backgrounds photos and live wallpapers to personalize your mobile home screen.


Main Features of Photo Editor Motion Effects - Photo Animation Maker :
• Select your photo from the gallery easily to motion photo gif.
• Animation creator with intuitive arrows sets photo motion direction — move the still image!
• Use the movement tool at each point of motion photo you want to give a live effect.
• Give direction to apply the motion effect.
• Background changer with stunning filters.
• With the stabilize tool, you can select the points not to be moved.
• Animation effects for pictures with overlays, sparkles, velocity control and more.
• Mask tool, you can define the region of the live picture.
• Make live animated photo motion with a cinema graph effect and moving pictures effect.
• Keyframe animation available for all settings.
• Use Cameras that pan, zoom, and support focus blur and fog.
• Picture effect editor for making all necessary 3D photo adjustments.
• Adjust Colors and change them as you wish!
• Use pixel motion to make your picture animated.
• Create live wallpapers with cool 3D motion effects.
• Add 3D animated overlays into your videos.
• Animation effects for pictures with overlays, glow, and more.
• Add effects to Borders, Shadows, and Strokes!
• Add text using the custom font support.
• Hd live wallpaper: set the live motion photo with effects as live wallpaper.
• Export MP4 video, GIF animation, PNG sequences, and stills.
• Share to your friend or social media like Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp etc.

Be part of the movement! Motion Video Photo Editor : Moving Photo Effect is the first professional motion design app bringing you professional-quality animation, motion graphics, visual effects, video editing, video compositing, and more!

Download Photo Motion Maker : Photo Animation Effect, become a photoloop artist, and show your 3d motion picture or cinemagraph pro with your friends now.
descriptionShort: Motion Photo Editor : Unique app to create animated photo with motion effects.
title: Motion Photo Editor
